name: Basic 6 Aviation
about: At Basic 6 Aviation, we offer a comprehensive flying program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to become proficient pilots. Our state-of-the-art facilities include advanced flight simulators and a fleet of modern training aircraft. With a low instructor-to-student ratio, our highly qualified instructors provide personalized attention and guidance. Our curriculum covers aerodynamics, navigation, aviation weather, and cross-country flight planning, ensuring students are well-prepared for the FAA Private Pilot Certificate. We pride ourselves on fostering a supportive and professional learning environment, helping our students achieve their aviation goals with confidence and excellence.
